thread.title: ACE of M.I.C.E. offers hosting in Istanbul
thread.title_full: ACE of M.I.C.E. offers hosting in Istanbul

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: ACE of M.I.C.E. offers hosting in Istanbul
text:
ACE of M.I.C.E. offers hosting in Istanbul ACE of M.I.C.E. offers hosting in Istanbul Details Created on Saturday, 05 September 2015 16:45 Third event attracts more exhibitors The third ACE OF M.I.C.E. Exhibition will be held in Istanbul on 16th to 18th March 2016. The 2015 event had 269 Exhibitors and the organisers report that there will be many additional participants in 2016. There were 11,687 visitors of which 656 were Hosted Buyers. The AME website is now open for applications to be a Hosted Buyer. 
The event operates a pre-scheduled B2B meetings online which resulted in 8,551 B2B meetings at the venues, Istanbul Congress Center (ICC) and Istanbul Lutfi Kırdar – ICEC In addition, there was a 3-day programme of conferences and panel discussions, addressed by 70 expert speakers. On March 17 2016 more than 2,500 MICE professionals will attend an Awards Ceremony, recognising the achievements of local businesses in this sector. Turkey is maintaining its position as a major MICE destination and the ACE of M.I.C.E. event is where visitors can mix with top suppliers from the Mediterranean, Eastern Europe, Middle East and Black Sea regions. Full details are at www.ameistanbul.com Related articles
